pages.text: 26|137|Hontoni kore wa, mukashi no yarikata ni sotonarimasen.
26|138|Watashi-tachi wa chobatsu sa renai nodesu.'
26|139|Kare-ra wa, kare o uso-tsukidearu to shita. Sokode ware wa kare-ra o horoboshita. Hontoni kono nakaniha, hitotsu no shirushi ga aru. Daga kare-ra no oku wa shinjinai.
26|140|Hontoni anata no omo wa iryoku narabinaku jihibukai okata de ara reru.
26|141|Samudo (no min) mo, shito-tachi o uso-tsukidearu to shita.
26|142|Kare-ra no doho sarifu ga, kare-ra ni itta toki o omoiokoshi nasai. `Anata gata wa omo o osorenai nodesu ka.
26|143|Hontoni watashi wa, anata gata e no seijitsuna shitodesu.
26|144|Dakara arra o osore watashi ni shitagai nasai.
26|145|Watashi wa anata gata ni kono koto de hoshu o motomenai. Watashi e no hoshu wa, tada ban'yu no nushi kara (itadaku) dakedesu.
26|146|Anata gata wa koko de, itsu made mo antaide i raremashou ka.
26|147|Kaju-en ya izumi,
26|148|kokumotsu hata ya, migotona waka mi o tsukeru natsumeyashi no en,
26|149|mata (iwa) yama ni, anata gataga takumi ni ie o kiri ugatte mo (antaideari eyou ka).
26|150|Dakara arra o osore, watashi ni shitagai nasai.
26|151|Anata gata wa, muhona jokiwoisshita-sha no meirei ni, shitagatte wa narimasen.
26|152|Kare-ra wa chijo ni kigai o hikiokosu mono de,(akuhei o) kyosei suru monode wa arimasen.'
26|153|Kare-ra wa itta. `Anata wa tsuka reta mono ni sugimasen.
26|154|Anata wa, watashi-tachi to onaji hitori no ningen ni sugimasen. Anata no iu no ga hontonara, watashi-tachi ni shirushi o motarashi nasai.'
26|155|Kare (sarifu) wa itta. `Koko ni itto no mesu rakuda ga imasu. Soreni mo mizunomi-bi ga ari, mata anata gata ni mo,(sorezore) kimerareta mizunomi-bi ga arimasu.
26|156|Idaina-bi no chobatsu ga anata gata o osowanai yo, soreni gai o kuwaete wa narimasen.'
26|157|Daga kare-ra wa, sono ken o kitte fugu ni shi, tachimachi kokai suru koto ni natta.
26|158|Sore wa chobatsu ga kare-ra o osottakaradearu. Hontoni kono nakaniha, hitotsu no shirushi ga aru. Daga kare-ra no oku wa shinjinai.
26|159|Hontoni anata no omo wa iryoku narabinaku jihibukai okata de ara reru.
